document.heading: Condominium and Cooperative Trash Collection Tax Credit of 1990

history.narrative: Law 8-180, the “Condominium and Cooperative Trash Collection Tax Credit of 1990,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-20, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue and reassigned to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 12, 1990, and June 26, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 18, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-248 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
